sentences.cn: …色情作品贬低妇女的这种看法。

sentences.en: A dishonest action like that will degrade you.
sentences.cn: 像这样不诚实的行为会使你降低身份.

sentences.en: Both myxoviruses and lysosomes are equipped with enzymes which can degrade glycoproteins.
sentences.cn: 粘液病毒和溶解体均装配某些能分解糖蛋白的酶.

sentences.en: Don't degrade yourself by answering him.
sentences.cn: 不要自贬身分去搭理他.

sentences.en: For some reason our balancing reflexes degrade with age.
sentences.cn: 我们的平衡反射,由于某种原因,随着年龄的增长而退化.

sentences.en: How can you degrade yourself by writing such trash?
sentences.cn: 你怎么能写这种垃圾作品来自贬身份呢？

sentences.en: However, note that reducing the shunt resistance will degrade the signal - to - noise ratio.
sentences.cn: 然而要注意减小分流电阻会 降低信号 噪声比.

sentences.en: It would only destroy her happiness, and degrade her in the public estimation.
sentences.cn: 那只会破坏她的幸福, 有损于她在社交界的声望.

sentences.en: Mixed bacteria could degrade poly ( vinyl alcohol ) ( PVA ) completely and produce extracellular PVA - degrading enzyme.
sentences.cn: 混合菌能完全降解 PVA,并产生胞外PVA降解酶.

sentences.en: Simply put, Mechanical - Age processes and representations tend to degrade user interactions in Information - Age products.
sentences.cn: 简而言之, 机械时代的过程和表现方式会有损信息时代产品的用户交互.

sentences.en: Such contamination , if not removed, can degrade the electrical characteristics of the devices.
sentences.cn: 如果不除去这种污染, 就会恶化器件的电性.

sentences.en: The dolphin’s habitat is being rapidly degraded.
sentences.cn: 海豚的栖息环境正遭到越发严重的破坏。

sentences.en: The enzyme armoury is sufficient to degrade most proteins to small peptides and amino acids.
sentences.cn: 这一酶库足以将大多数蛋白质降解成短肽和氨基酸.

sentences.en: The organophosphates degrade fairly rapidly in soil.
sentences.cn: 有机磷酸盐在土壤中降解十分迅速.

sentences.en: The results show that the new type reactor could degrade benzamide efficiently.
sentences.cn: 研究表明,该反应器可有效降解苯甲酰胺.

sentences.en: When I asked him if he had ever been to a prostitute he said he wouldn't degrade himself like that.
sentences.cn: 我问他是否找过妓女时，他说他不会自贬身份去干那种事情。

sentences.en: Why does blending genetic materials between species degrade form?
sentences.cn: 为什么混合不同物种间的基因物质会退化形体 呢 ?

sentences.en: You degrade yourself when you tell a lie.
sentences.cn: 说谎会贬低自己的身分.

words.tran_cn: 退化的；堕落的；被降级的
可耻的；丧失体面的；不名誉的
分解（degrade的过去分词）；降低…的身份；削减
退化（degrade的ing形式）；减少；降低…的身份

trans.tran_cn: 降低…的身份； 降解； 退化
有辱…的人格，（使）退化，降解，降低
trans.tran_en: to treat someone without respect and make them lose respect for themselves

trans.tran_cn: 降低…的身份， 有辱…的人格； 使降解， 使退化
trans.tran_en: to treat someone without respect and make them lose respect for themselves
